metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9081 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The Illuminate component of Laravel Framework 5.7.x has a deserialization vulnerability that can lead to remote code execution if the content is controllable, related to the __destruct method of the PendingCommand class in PendingCommand.php.

criterions.comment: php-laravel-framework package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
